bioconda.name: yass
bioconda.summary: YASS is a genomic similarity search tool, for nucleic (DNA/RNA) sequences in fasta or plain text format.

biocontainers.name: yass
biocontainers.summary: YASS is a genomic similarity search tool, for nucleic (DNA/RNA) sequences in fasta or plain text format

biotools.summary: YASS is a genomic similarity search tool, for nucleic (DNA/RNA) sequences in fasta or plain text format (it produces local pairwise alignments).

bioschemas.name: YASS
bioschemas.summary: YASS is a genomic similarity search tool, for nucleic (DNA/RNA) sequences in fasta or plain text format (it produces local pairwise alignments).
